error.noQuestion: Nenhuma pergunta foi escrita para o usuario!

error.fail: Falha ao executar um comando git!

error.noPath: No valid path has been provide to load the configuration from!

config.fail: Erro ao carregar as configurações padrão!

fatal.invalidQuestionNumber: Expected %s questions, but only had %s. The installer will terminate, please contact the creator of ArunaCore to check the error.

messages.starting: Iniciando o Instalador da Aruna Core...

debug.question: Do you want enable ArunaCore debug? (ArunaCore debug messages will be shown in console)
debug.warn: Use only yes/no for this answer.

prefix.question: Prefix for ArunaCore. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull.

debug.question: Do you want enable Internal Websocket debug? (Websocket debug messages will be shown in console)
debug.warn: Use only yes/no for this answer.

prefix.question: Prefix for Websocket. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull.

port.question: Websocket port. This value need to be something between 1 and 65535. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull. (Keep this port PRIVATE!)
port.warn: Use only numbers between 1 and 65535 for this answer.

host.question: Websocket host. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull.

enable.question: Do you want enable Native HTTP Server?
enable.warn: Use only yes/no for this answer.

debug.question: Do you want enable HTTP Server debug? (HTTP Server debug messages will be shown in console)
debug.warn: Use only yes/no for this answer.

prefix.question: Prefix for HTTP Server. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull.

port.question: HTTP Server port. This value need to be something between 1 and 65535 and different from Websocket port. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull. (keeping this port open to the public is recommended)
port.warn: Use only numbers between 1 and 65535 for this answer.

host.question: HTTP Server host. Change this can breake some modules, be carrefull.

debug.question: Do you want enable Modules debug? (ALL Modules debug messages will be shown in console)
debug.warn: Use only yes/no for this answer.

sucess.message: Aruna Core has been sucessfully installed!
